title: Version
description: The version of a product that follows the SemVer 2.0 specification

major.description: The major version number that is incremented on breaking changes

minor.description: The minor version number that is incremented on the addition of backward compatible functionality

patch.description: The patch version number that is incremented for backward compatible bug fixes

suffix.description: The optional pre-release suffix (E.g. alpha.3, beta.110, rc.68)
